statements: UPDATE inventory_management SET quantity = 50, stock_level = 20 WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE inventory_management SET demand_pattern = 'High', stock_level = 30 WHERE product_id = 102
UPDATE inventory_management SET stock_level = stock_level + 10, quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE inventory_management SET quantity = quantity + 20, stock_level = stock_level - 15 WHERE product_id = 105
UPDATE inventory_management SET current_stock = current_stock + 10 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE stock_adjustments SET adjustment_date = '2023-09-15', adjustment_quantity = 20 WHERE adjustment_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory_management SET current_stock = current_stock - 10, demand_pattern = 'Stable' WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE stock_adjustments SET adjustment_quantity = adjustment_quantity + 5, adjustment_date = '2023-09-15', reason = 'Replenishment' WHERE adjustment_id = 456;
UPDATE Inventory SET StockLevel = 20 WHERE ProductID = 1;
UPDATE Sales SET Quantity = 50, SaleDate = '2022-01-15' WHERE SaleID = 10;
UPDATE Inventory SET StockLevel = StockLevel + 10 WHERE ProductID = 101;
UPDATE Sales SET Quantity = 50, SaleDate = '2022-12-31' WHERE ProductID = 201 AND SaleID = 301;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, stock_level = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sales SET sale_amount = 1000, sale_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = price * 1.1, stock_level = stock_level - 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sales SET sale_amount = sale_amount * 2, sale_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE inventory_items SET stock_level = stock_level + 5 WHERE item_id = 101
UPDATE sales_orders SET status = 'Shipped', total_amount = total_amount + 50.00 WHERE order_id = 201
UPDATE inventory_items SET stock_level = stock_level - 5 WHERE item_id = 101
UPDATE sales_orders SET status = 'Shipped', total_amount = total_amount - 10.50 WHERE order_id = 201
